get.description:
Search across movies, people, and genres.

- q: search query string
- types: comma-separated list of types to search (movies,people,genres). Default: all
- limit: max results per type

schema.title: Response Search Api V1 Search Get

get.description:
List reviews with optional filters.

- page: page number (1-based)
- limit: results per page
- movieId: filter by movie external_id
- userId: filter by user external_id
- sortBy: date_desc, date_asc, rating_desc, rating_asc, helpful_desc

schema.title: Response List Reviews Api V1 Reviews Get

post.description: Create a new review for a movie

schema.title: Response Create Review Api V1 Reviews Post
Response Get Review Api V1 Reviews  Review Id  Get

get.description:
List collections with optional filters.

- page: page number (1-based)
- limit: results per page
- userId: filter by user external_id
- isPublic: filter by public/private status

schema.title: Response List Collections Api V1 Collections Get

get.description:
List watchlist items with optional filters.

- page: page number (1-based)
- limit: results per page
- userId: filter by user external_id
- status: filter by status (want-to-watch, watching, watched)

get.description:
List favorite items with optional filters.

- page: page number (1-based)
- limit: results per page
- userId: filter by user external_id
- type: filter by type (movie, person, scene, article, all)
